risk_factors: Momentum divergence widening (116 vs 150+ stocks)â€”distribution risk masking all-time highs
Regulatory enforcement and sector-specific guidance cuts creating near-term margin pressure
Geopolitical uncertainty (Russia-Ukraine, Taiwan) and options expiration volatility amplifying downside
Precious metals reversal momentum could accelerate if support breaks (silver $79.30)
Consensus bullish case depends on macro data surprises; absent those, path of least resistance is downward
analysis.intraday_levels: SPY: Watch for active call wall resistance at $700 (146k OI); support at $670 (active hedging at 2.9%). QQQ: Resistance at $630 (33k OI) and $625 (29k OI - both active); watch for breakdown if momentum breadth deteriorates further. Silver and precious metals weakness may create risk-off pressure intraday. Testing support levels across equities likely given stated momentum divergence.
analysis.swing_levels: SPY: Primary resistance $700, followed by dormant resistance at $730 (48k OI, 5.7%) and $750 (55k OI, 8.6%). Support deterioration would target $670 (active), then $645 (dormant, 6.6%), with major put wall support at $640. QQQ: Resistance at $630-$640 (active hedging); breakdown targets $590 put wall (164k OI) with further support at $585 (137k OI). 1-5 day horizon: expect testing of near-term support as precious metals exhaustion and momentum divergence play out; bullish reversal requires positive surprises on macro data.
